headline: Dow Notches Its 12th Record of 2025 as Earnings Deliver
summary: Another wave of solid earnings reports on Tuesday pushed the Dow Jones Industrial Average to its twelfth record closing high of the year.  The blue-chip index gained 218 points, or 0.5%.  The Nasdaq Composite dropped 0.2%.

content.title: Dow Notches Its 12th Record of 2025 as Earnings Deliver
content.summary: Another wave of solid earnings reports on Tuesday pushed the Dow Jones Industrial Average to its twelfth record closing high of the year.  The blue-chip index gained 218 points, or 0.5%.  The Nasdaq Composite dropped 0.2%.

headline: Apple gets 2 price target lifts, 3M raises outlook again
summary: Morning Brief host Julie Hyman examines the stories driving investor interest in some of Tuesday's trending tickers, including Goldman Sachs and Wells Fargo analysts boosting their price targets for Apple (AAPL), 3M's (MMM) strong outlook, and the US government shutdown's impact on Unilever's (UL) demerger. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief.

content.title: Apple gets 2 price target lifts, 3M raises outlook again

Morning Brief host Julie Hyman examines the stories driving investor interest in some of Tuesday's trending tickers, including Goldman Sachs and Wells Fargo analysts boosting their price targets for Apple (AAPL), 3M's (MMM) strong outlook, and the US government shutdown's impact on Unilever's (UL) demerger.

To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief.

headline: 3M tops third-quarter expectations, raises full-year outlook
summary: Investing.com -- 3M Company (NYSE:MMM) reported third-quarter adjusted earnings on Tuesday that exceeded analyst expectations, with strong margin improvement prompting the company to raise its full-year guidance.

content.title: 3M tops third-quarter expectations, raises full-year outlook
content.summary: Investing.com -- 3M Company (NYSE:MMM) reported third-quarter adjusted earnings on Tuesday that exceeded analyst expectations, with strong margin improvement prompting the company to raise its full-year guidance.

headline: 3M’s (NYSE:MMM) Q3: Strong Sales
summary: Industrial conglomerate 3M (NYSE:MMM) reported Q3 CY2025 results exceeding the market’s revenue expectations, with sales up 7.4% year on year to $6.52 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $2.19 per share was 5.6% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

content.title: 3M’s (NYSE:MMM) Q3: Strong Sales
content.summary: Industrial conglomerate 3M (NYSE:MMM) reported Q3 CY2025 results exceeding the market’s revenue expectations, with sales up 7.4% year on year to $6.52 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $2.19 per share was 5.6% above analysts’ consensus estimates.
